sentences: The twenty-fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies and first session of the AWG were held in Bonn in May 2006.
Prior to these meetings, the first UNFCCC dialogue on long-term action was held, as agreed at COP 11 .
In the AWG , delegates exchanged initial views on the process for considering future commitments for Annex I parties for the post-2012 period.
After extensive consultations, an agreement was reached on a text setting out the AWG plans for its future work. SBI and SBSTA together adopted 30 conclusions and one draft decision.
However, most of these texts did not contain substantive agreements, and instead simply forwarded the issues to SB 25 for further consideration.
